name: Monsters under the bed
description:
Who’s not afraid of monsters under the bed? They’re always in our room, hiding down there to scare us when we least expect it, but we can finally fight them! Embark on this fantastic adventure to defeat your childhood fears and discover new monsters!

Choose your starter and fight against each monster in your room with the right playstyle,  upgrade your companion attributes on each level and enjoy is evolution based on his stats.

A more aggressive playstyle allows you to deal more precise and heavy attacks, then a more defensive playstyle allows you to parry attacks but makes your attacks slower and lighter   

The game was a submission of The Indie Tales Jam

Some honorable mentions of the monsters that didn't make it  to be part of the game :

Flaffycat,  GrupyOwl, Greenleaf, LavaDog,  GarliClown

      

(they probably gonna be added in the near future )

hope you enjoy the game and feel free to leave a comment below!
